channel.title: Blog on ahjadann's fireplace
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on ahjadann's fireplace

item.title: Awesome you're here
item.description: Hey there, this is Tobi. Since this is indeed a nice, but blog related theme there apparently has to be this one blog post. I won’t use this site for blogging, so please don’t expect any posts. This is only for me showing off stuff I do or make and to play around. Regardless, feel free to check out my fireplace !
